titleStmt.title: Mr. Richard Baxter's paraphrase on the Psalms of David in metre with other hymns / left fitted for the press by his own hand.
titleStmt.author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Thomas Parkhurst ... and Jonathan Robinson ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
